info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Eddy and central Lea Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 441 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles west of Lovington to 10 miles southwest of Maljamar. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lovington, Maljamar and Halfway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
